lore:
"Listen up laddie! I have some words for ye.
Across the eons of time, Champions give dere weapons glorious names; Lifetaker, Big Beater, World Breaker...da list goes on and on.

Guess how many have named dere armor? Ya know the thing that protects dem from certain death, and the reason we work dis forge!

Zero, Nought, Nichts!!

Jokes on dem though! Fer every weapon dey need ta replace, dey also be needen four pieces o armor! FOUR!!!!
Bleed dem where it really hurts! Da coin purse!"
-Ancient Forgemaster
